title: Name variables
text: Let $$n$$ $$=$$ the first number and $$m$$ $$=$$ the second number.
speech: Let  n   is equal to,  the first number and  m  , is equal to  the second number.

title: Equations
text: We know the sum of the two numbers is $$15$$, and that one number is $$3$$ less than the other. Using this, we can create two equations. One is $$n+m=15$$, and the other $$n=m-3$$

title: Solve
text: Now, solve for $$n$$ or $$m$$, and plug it into the equation to find the other variable.
